entry.title: shwestrick: mpl-tinykaboom
entry.content: A port (MPL) of a port (Futhark) of the KABOOM (C++) tiny graphics program.

entry.title: diku-dk: sml-sobol
entry.content: Standard ML library for Sobol sequences

entry.title: anmelus: SML-COMP-212-Functional-Programming-Answers
entry.content: Completed this class independently to learn how to do functional programming. Has almost all coding problems answered, sometimes there would be one very hard one that I just did not finish. Skipped anything asking to compute/prove the time complexity of as I already have experience proving time complexity of most of the algorithms shown. On very small occasions I had to look online at someone else's code to completely understand what issue I was having which has resulted in a few changes in coding styles towards the end of some assignments.
